===Etymology===
Compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=ようちえん|幼稚|tr1=yōchi|t1={{l|en|infantile}}|園|tr2=en|t2={{l|en|garden}}}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref><ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref><ref name="DJS">{{R:Daijisen}}</ref>  The term is apparently a {{cal|nocap=1|ja|sort=ようちえん|etyl lang=de|etyl term=Kindergarten|etyl t={{l|en|children}}'s {{l|en|garden}}}}, as Japanese ''yōchien'' were started in 1876 based on the German model initiated by {{w|Friedrich Fröbel}} in 1837 and on the term {{m|de|Kindergarten}} that he coined in 1840.<ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref><ref name="DJS">{{R:Daijisen}}</ref>
